.animation (~"my-animation 6s backwards 2s, my-second-animation 3s linear alternate infinite");

CSS3 animation according to specs: W3C specification, MDN spec, examples.

.animation-delay (1s); W3C MDN .animation-delay (~"750ms, 2s"); W3C MDN .animation-direction (); W3C MDN .animation-direction (~"normal, alternate"); W3C MDN .animation-duration (2s); W3C MDN
